name: Nest Making and Grappling Hooks
description:
Ready your grappling hooks!

Birb was living a peacefull life, until their nest gets destroyed, now Birb will adventure collecting materials to rebuild their house, even if it means dismantling other nests.

Explore a series of maps collecting pieces of the broken bird house and destroying other nests along the way to rebuild Birb's home even better than before.

<strong>Controls</strong> Arrow keys - Movement Mouse - Grappling Hooks Space Bar - Jump Escape Key - Pause
